candidates.text: Budget reconciliation is 3 months behind at any given time

selectedCandidate: Budget reconciliation is 3 months behind at any given time

autopsy.originsConstraints: Was built around a specific person's skills who left 3 years ago. The government industry had different pressures then, and the process reflected that reality.
autopsy.assumptionsWorkarounds: The team believes leadership wants it this way, but leadership thinks the team prefers it. Meanwhile, people have built workarounds: a 'special request' process that most work goes through.
autopsy.stakesOutcomes: Fixing this would reveal how much time has been wasted, which feels politically risky. The real goal is better quality, but the current process has become an end in itself.

workflow.aiDoes: Collects data from multiple sources, runs initial analysis, flags anomalies
workflow.humanDoes: Validates findings, adds context AI can't access, makes final calls
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. Patterns are clear and repeatable.

workflow.aiDoes: Drafts communications, maintains consistency, handles routine updates
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews for tone, handles sensitive messages, manages relationships
workflow.reasoning: Routine enough for AI with this type of work. Human relationships matter here.

workflow.aiDoes: Runs all standard checks, compares against requirements, documents findings
workflow.humanDoes: Reviews exceptions, makes judgment calls, signs off on final output
workflow.reasoning: Quality requires this type of work. The volume makes automation essential.

workflow.aiDoes: Manages calendars, resolves conflicts, sends reminders, tracks completion
workflow.humanDoes: Handles escalations, makes priority decisions, manages exceptions
workflow.reasoning: AI excels at this type of work. The volume makes automation essential.

workflow.aiDoes: Suggests templates, organizes information, maintains consistency
workflow.humanDoes: Provides expertise, validates accuracy, decides what matters
workflow.reasoning: Human judgment needed for this type of work. Consistency is the key value-add.

desuck.learning: Track error rates weekly. Feed human corrections back to improve AI recommendations. Review collaboration modes monthly and adjust based on what's working.

transition.humanElement: Start with the most receptive department. Get IT aligned before expanding.
transition.pilotPlan: Run a one-month pilot with a single team. Measure before and after, then scale based on results.
